io.spine.server.reflect

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.reflect.Field

  • public final class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides information and dynamic access to a field of a Message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • forFilter

        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<Field> forFilter(java.lang.Class<? extends com.google.protobuf.Message> messageClass,
                                                               io.spine.base.FieldFilter filter)
        Creates instance for a field specified by the passed filter.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - the class of messages containing the field
        filter - the field filter
        Returns:
        an Field wrapped into Optional or Optional.absent() if there is no such field in the passed message class

      • getFieldClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getFieldClass(com.google.protobuf.Descriptors.FieldDescriptor field)
        Returns the class of the Protobuf message field.
        Parameters:
        field - the field descriptor
        Returns:
        the class of the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the field type is unknown

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Obtains the name of the field.

      • getValue

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<com.google.protobuf.Message> getValue(com.google.protobuf.Message object)
        Obtains the value of the field in the passed object.

        If the corresponding field is of type Any it will be unpacked.

        Returns:
        field value or unpacked field value, or Optional.absent() if the field is a default Any
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if getting the field value caused an exception. The root cause will be available from the thrown instance.
